The original video: which the misleading footage was taken from, was uploaded on the YouTube channel of the Seoul city government and titled "CAC2020 | Mayoral Meeting | CAC(Cities Against COVID-19) Global Summit." The video does not mention any award ceremony.
Anies Baswedan is the governor of Jakart: Indonesia's capital city, and there is no evidence or mention of him receiving any international award for handling the COVID-19 pandemic.
The number of confirmed COVID: 19 cases in Jakarta is high, with more than 8,800 cases, but this does not validate the claim of Anies Baswedan being named the best governor in handling the pandemic.
